Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.13 Hetuduka, Parittārammaṇattika » 1.13.3 Appamāṇārammaṇapada » 1.13.3.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Parittārammaṇattika
Appamāṇārammaṇapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
397.
856Hetuṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
857Nahetuṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
858Hetuṃ appamāṇārammaṇañca nahetuṃ appamāṇārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
398.
859Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme nava, vipāke nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
